function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of implementation of standards and guidelines for resilience in the built environment","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious disease propagation in communities","Mitigation":"Implementation of existing standards and guidelines, as well as the development of new ones to fill gaps","Technologies":"Resilient design and construction materials, advanced infrastructure planning and management systems","People":"Communities relying on the built environment","Owner":"National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)"}]}
